## AABB.behindPlane() method

Check if the box is behind a plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
behindPlane(p: Plane): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | [Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md) | The plane to be tested. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the box is behind the plane, otherwise false.
